nodes.text: Battle sense was a Ta-Ree spell capable of being wielded by Ascendants on the planet Kathol. Ascendants using battle sense were more focused and concentrated in combat situations. To the Ascendant, opponents became mentally highlighted making them easier to attack or defend against, knowing when to make the right move during a fight. The wielder was required to know the detect life and sense danger Ta-Ree spells to learn the battle sense spell.
